summary: An email from Assistant U.S. Attorney A. Marie Villafaña to Lanna Belohlavek regarding Jeffrey Epstein, indicating Villafaña will confer about requested facts. This shows communication between a federal prosecutor and another party about the Epstein case in December 2007.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
